channel.title: Home on Hugo-Tufte Theme Example Site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Hugo-Tufte Theme Example Site

item.title: Tufte CSS
item.description: Tufte CSS provides tools to style web articles using the ideas demonstrated by Edward Tufte‚Äôs books and handouts. Tufte‚Äôs style is known for its simplicity, extensive use of sidenotes, tight integration of graphics with text, and carefully chosen typography.‚ö† This demo page is a technical replicate of the original Tufte CSS page on Edward Tufte’s GitHub site. Information may not accurately reflect features of the hugo-tufte theme. Tufte CSS was created by Dave Liepmann and is now an Edward Tufte project.

item.title: Hide Date
item.description: Here is an example post where the date set, but hidden from display. Moreover, the reading time is also hidden.
